first_translate: I think we’re far enough away now.
yes.

hangle: 황태자 전하께서도 사람이 많으니 어쩌지 못하실 거예요.
first_translate: the ball is crowded, so I’m sure his highness won’t notice us here.
well then...
let me introduce myself properly.
my name’s livia priscilla.
oh my goodness...!
nice meeting you! I’m lady fiona haelion.

hangle: 사교계에서 피오나 영애를 뵙는 건 처음이네요.
first_translate: this is actually my first time seeing you at any events like this.
that's because I've been living out in haeleon all these years.
it was my first time attending a capital city ball as well.
hmm... haoleon...

hangle: 정말 많은 분들의 호기심을 자극하는 곳이죠.
first_translate: a place that sparks many people’s curiosity.
is it really...?

hangle: 어쨌든 도움을 받았으니 보답을 하고 싶네요.
first_translate: in any case, since you helped me earlier,
ahem.

hangle: 조만간 가문에서 작은 티 파티를 열 예정인데,
first_translate: my family will soon host a small tea party.
may I invite you there?
pardon? a tea party?
livia priscilla?! she wants to invite me to her famous tea party?!

hangle: 무릇 귀족 영애라면 초대받고 싶어 선망한다는 그곳?!
first_translate: every noblewoman dreams about getting invited to one of those parties!!!
while it may not seem much for repayment,

hangle: 피오나 영애가 하루빨리 사교계에 적응하는 데 도움이 될 거예요.
first_translate: I believe it’ll help you get accustomed to life in high society more quickly.
if you put it that way...
then thank you very much for inviting me.
no, thank you instead.

hangle: 후에 헤일론 저택으로 정식 초대장을 보낼게요.
first_translate: I'll send your invitation card later on.
alright...
whoa!

hangle: 어쩌다 보니 리비아랑 친분을 쌓게 되었네.
first_translate: somehow, I became friends with livia just like that.

hangle: 이거 또 원작이랑 달라지는 것 같은데, 괜찮을까…
first_translate: but things are turning out differently from what happened in the novel... am I going to be okay?
all of them were arrogant brats!
livia priscilla.

hangle: 아름다운 외모에 가문도 든든해서 마음에 들었다.
first_translate: not only does she have good looks, but also comes from a powerful family. how perfect.

hangle: 내 옆자리에 있을 여자로 완벽하지 않은가.
first_translate: she’d make the ideal woman by my side.

hangle: 줄곧 중립을 지켰던 프리실라 가문이 내 편이 되면,
first_translate: and if house priscilla becomes our ally after maintaining their neutrality until now,

hangle: 내 위치도 더욱 확고해질 게 분명하고!
first_translate: my position would become even stronger than before!

hangle: 황태자비가 될 수 있으니 저에게도 나쁜 조건이 아닌데,
first_translate: on top of that, becoming the future crown princess isn’t such a bad deal either.
yet why did she keep refusing me?

hangle: 제국에서 아버지를 제외하곤 내가 가장 고귀한 사람이건만!
first_translate: doesn’t she know that aside from father, I'm the most important person in the entire empire?!
tsk.
fine. let’s go chase after her again--
ooh.
so her name was fiona haelion.
now that I take another look, she has quite pretty features too.

hangle: 수도에서는 보기 드문 은발에, 선명한 붉은 색 눈동자도 좋고.
first_translate: silver hair is rare in the capital, and her bright red eyes suit her nicely.
since she’s slender, it makes me want to protect her.

hangle: 게다가, 헤일론 공작이 결혼한 기억은 없으니…
first_translate: and duke haelion never married anyone...
that must mean she’s illegitimate.

hangle: 그렇다면 다소 가지고 놀아도 큰 뒤탈은 없겠지!!
first_translate: if that’s the case, playing around with her shouldn’t cause any problems!!
fiona haelion...
crown prince’s delusion
please don’t leave me behind!
hmph!
I played along despite being leagues above her status, yet she still acts annoyingly toward me.
you’re not half-bad yourself.
your highness.
what brings you here?
gosh, you scared me...
do you see something interesting over there?

hangle: 이 형님에게 인사도 없이 말을 걸다니.
first_translate: why do you speak without greeting me first?
or perhaps you didn’t learn basic manners due to being illegitimate.
answer me!

hangle: 내가 이런 녀석의 눈치를 아주 잠시나마 봤다니.
first_translate: to think I ever cared about what someone like him thought of me.
right, you said you came from haelion too.

hangle: 그럼 저 여자에 관해 아는 게 있겠군.
first_translate: that means you probably know some stuff about that girl.

hangle: 저 은발에 붉은 눈을 한 여자 말이다.
first_translate: the silver-haired beauty with crimson-colored eyes.
I can’t tell where you’re trying to lead this conversation.
she seems fairly beautiful,
so maybe I could play with her for a bit.
I’ve had nothing better to do lately anyway.
that reason doesn’t deserve a response.
excuse me?
how dare you talk back to me...

hangle: 감히 황태자인 이 형님에게 무슨 말버릇이냐!!
first_translate: ...when I’m the crown prince and your older brother?!
try harder next time, big bro.
argh...!
th-that bastard...!
th-that bastard...!
can you please let go?!
wait, is it already my turn?
j-just hold on...
wh-what are you doing--?
kegh!
klegh...
hrng...
let me warn you.
I couldn’t care less whether or not I sit upon your throne...
...or even the emperor’s.
u-ugh...
there’s only one thing...
...I desire in this world.
but...
urgh...
if you lay hands on her...
regardless of who you are...
...and whatever powers you possess,
I swear to kill you in the most painful manner possible.
get that straight into your head, big bro.
